helen.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • helen.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a Processing-drawable Rectangle.
    Version:
    9.20.17
    Author:
    Helen Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()

      Creates new instance of Rectangle object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        sets default Rectangle, all to zero

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates new instance of Rectangle object
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - Pixel width
        height - Pixel height

    • Method Detail

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Returns:
        absolute value of the rectangle's perimeter

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Returns:
        absolute value of the rectangle's area

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Checks if a point is inside the rectangle
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the point
        y - Y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        boolean of whether the point is inside the rectangle

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the rectangle and fills, called on a Rectangle object in DrawingSurface
        Parameters:
        marker - PApplet object
        Postcondition:
        rectangle should be drawn

      • isSquare

        public void isSquare()
        Prints out the side (width vs. height) that is greater or prints that it is a square

      • translate

        public void translate(double shiftX,
                      double shiftY)
        Moves the rectangle
        Parameters:
        shiftX - X pixels that the rectangle will be translated by
        shiftY - Y pixels that the rectangle will be translated by

      • changeColour

        public void changeColour(boolean isGrey)
        Will fill the rectangle in either w random gray shade or with a colour
        Parameters:
        isGrey - boolean of whether or not the shape should be filled in greyscale or with rbg colour
        Postcondition:
        the implicit parameter (shape) will be filled in with a colour
